title: Social Engagement Recommendations
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to suggest social events based on my interests and availability so that I can stay socially connected and engaged despite my limited mobility.

title: Family Connection Tools - Scheduled Video Calls for Social Engagement
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to schedule video calls with my family and friends easily, so that I can maintain my social connections despite my limited mobility.

title: Interest-Based Community Interaction – Facilitating Local Meetups and Clubs
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to suggest local meetups and clubs based on my interests so that I can stay socially connected and continue volunteering despite my limited mobility.

title: Memory Lane Features – Storytelling Prompts for Social Connection
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to provide me with storytelling prompts that encourage sharing my experiences and memories, so that I can maintain social connections and engage meaningfully with my family and friends despite my limited mobility.

title: Flexible Communication Modes – Voice-to-Text Messaging for Social Engagement
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to use voice-to-text messaging to easily communicate with my family and friends, so that I can stay socially connected despite my limited mobility.

title: Social Skill Building Activities – Conversation Starters for Enhanced Engagement
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to provide conversation starters and social skill-building activities so that I can maintain social connections and engage meaningfully with others despite my limited mobility.

title: Proactive Check-Ins for Social Inclusion
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to perform proactive check-ins and suggest social activities based on my interests so that I can stay socially connected and engaged despite my limited mobility.
